org.gradle.api.file
Interface FileVisitor

public interface FileVisitor

A FileVisitor is used to visit each of the files in a FileTree.

Method Summary
 void visitDir(FileVisitDetails dirDetails)
          Visits a directory.
 void visitFile(FileVisitDetails fileDetails)
          Visits a file.
